pageContext.claim: “But when they did to me -- whether it's surveillance or a much stronger term -- because I believe it was a much stronger term --than that and a lot of other people do. Nobody politicized the Justice Department more than Barack Obama.”
pageContext.analysis: It has been reported that an FBI informant in Europe, a professor named Stefan Halper, met with at least three people working on the Trump campaign in Europe. So far, there has been nothing to indicate whether there was a political agenda or a “spy” mandate as part of Halper's assistance for the FBI, which started after the agency opened a counterintelligence probe. Carter Page was no longer a Trump campaign staff member when the the Justice Department obtained court authority to monitor his conversations.
